title: Jacqueline Novak | Trump Blasts “Impeachment Light” at Deranged Rally: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump calling the charges against him “impeachment light,” as one of his main conspiracy theories about the FBI was officially debunked.

Then, Jacqueline Novak talks about her show Get on Your Knees, makes plans for her next visit and discusses her therapist falling asleep in her session.

She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
